data.eml:eml: A new species of Paracometes Villiers, 1958 from Panama (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Disteniinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heffern, Daniel, Santos-Silva, Antonio (2016): A new species of Paracometes Villiers, 1958 from Panama (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Disteniinae). Zootaxa 4072 (5): 593-595, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.5.8
